p: Leaves were shade-dried for three weeks, grinded into powder using an electrical grinder, and kept in polythene bags with proper labeling for further use. 50 grams of each powder sample were added separately into 250 ml of methanol solvent in a conical flask at room temperature. After 48 hours, the extracts were filtered with Whatman No. 1 filter paper. The extracts were stored in air-tight glass at 4°C for further analysis.
